ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are very grateful for the financial support obtained from Rajamangala University of Technology Krungtep (UTK) and the International Affairs Division, Kasetsart University. We are also grateful to associate Professor Aram Attajadee—an emeritus professor of the Faculty of Agro-Industrial Technology, Rajamangala University of Technology Tawan-ok, Thailand—for plant identification, the Department of Food Science and Technology, Faculty of Agro-Industry, Kasetsart University, and the Department of Food and Nutritional Sciences, University of Reading, United Kingdom, for providing access to the experimental facilities.
